game.name: DCS: DCS: AV-8B Kerman Campaign by Ground Pounder Sims
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: Join ‘Detachment B’ of US Marine Corps Harrier squadron VMA-311 as they embark on ‘The Kerman Campaign’.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join ‘Detachment B’ of US Marine Corps Harrier squadron VMA-311 as they embark on ‘The Kerman Campaign’.
game.developers: Eagle Dynamics SA, Ground Pounder Sim
